code: import sanityClient from"@sanity/client";import imageUrlBuilder from"@sanity/image-url";export var client=sanityClient({projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_PROJECT_ID,dataset:"production",apiVersion:"2022-06-12",useCdn:true,token:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_TOKEN,ignoreBrowserTokenWarning:true});var builder=imageUrlBuilder(client);export var urlFor=function urlFor(source){return builder.image(source);};
